# range - A simple library for range(a, b, step).

# REQUIREMENTS

 - [Node.js](http://nodejs.org/)

# DEVELOPMENT

## Linting

Keep the code tidy:

    $ npm run-script lint

# EXAMPLE

    $ git clone https://github.com/mcandre/node-range.git
    $ cd node-range
    $ node fizzbuzz.js
    Server running at http://127.0.0.1:8124/

    1
    2
    Fizz
    4
    Buzz
    Fizz
    7
    8
    Fizz
    Buzz
    11
    Fizz
    13
    14
    FizzBuzz
    ...
